sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import './Register.css' const initialUser = {Firstname: "", Lastname: "", Username: "", Email: "", phone_No: "", Password: ""} const Register = ({name}) =>{ const [user, setUser] = useState(initialUser); if(name !== "user"){ throw new Error("something went wrong!!") } const Register = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() setUser(user) console.log(user) } return(

Register {name}

setUser({...user, Firstname: e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user, Lastname: e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user, Username: e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user, Email: e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user, phone_No: e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user, Password: e.target.value})}/>
) } export default Register
